title: Correction: The Wnt Receptor Ryk Reduces Neuronal and Cell Survival Capacity by Repressing FOXO Activity During the Early Phases of Mutant Huntingtin Pathogenicity
fullText: The eleventh author's name is spelled incorrectly. The correct name is: Jung Mook Lyu.
